title: Macoach
author: Macoach
content: Omo my fellow Niger men and women how una dey see this thing wey dey happen for our country cost of food dey increase on a monthly basis to chop common breakfast fit cost you like 700 - 1000 for management oh. And we dey farm dey produce rice and garri, even most raw materials wey them dey use make process food we get am , how come everything cost like this . Watin we go say be the cause of this one now . E Don vex me all person money now dey go for food . Abeg make una contribute for this matter I know say e dey vex all of us

comments.author: Abu-Naim
comments.body: 700 -100 Naira for breakfast self depend on where you de leave, e get some places wey that money no go do you to chop. You talk say we de produce d raw materials wey dem take de use produce some of dis good and e still cost, d reason be say d cost of production and transportation don go up and even farmers wey de farm d product self de buy other things, so as other things de expensive dem also make what de produce to be expensive so dat them go benefit from their work because even fertilizers now wey dem de use don cost and government no de support de like dat.

comments.author: Egii Nna
comments.body: I have already done a survey on this issue, and what I discovered is that all this issue comes from the cost of fuel because many farmers that farm are complaining that the amount of fertiliser is very high and the cost of transportation from their various locations to the city is very high, so if they don’t increase the amount of product they sell, they will end up losing money and might not farm again. I even visited some near-by villages, and some farmers told me that they just farm what they can profit from, and most maize farmers didn’t farm maize this year because of the high cost of fertiliser, so with this, I can say Nigeria is getting to something else. All I can say it let work hard and pray

comments.author: Promocodeudo
comments.body: Nigeria has gone from worst to too bad, sometimes I see a good reason to say that our leaders has no conscience, how will you allow the people that you are leading to die in hunger, our leader doesn't like the idea of licensing more production companies or better still encouraging small firms that are into production, because most of them have share or quota in a particular man business that have decided to keep his people in the dark by inflating the price of everything through the help of the government, Nigeria has everything within her reach not to allow it's citizen suffer, removal of subsidy has been the major cause for the suffering of Nigerians, a government that wake up and announce the removal of the only thing the citizens benefit from, without putting things in place to caution the effects that may arise as a result of this, I think its time for the right thing to be done, because the current hunger in the land is so unbearable that, it takes God to control people not to do otherwise, Nigeria needs urgent revitalization, and that's the way we should go.

comments.author: Odohu
comments.body: The salary of an average Nigerian worker is about N150,000( $160) per month and this is for graduates that have put in some years of service. Unfortunately, base on the currenct economic realities of our country, 50% of this fund is spent on feeding. This is to say that many people are leaving from hand to mouth because the remaining 50% is not enough to cover to shelter, health, clothing, utilities and other basic amenities. If urgent steps are not taken, people will drift towards depression and that is not good for a country with population of 200 million people.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: Macoach on September 17, 2023, 05:52:52 AMOmo my fellow Niger men and women how una dey see this thing wey dey happen for our country cost of food dey increase on a monthly basis to chop common breakfast fit cost you like 700 - 1000 for management oh. And we dey farm dey produce rice and garri, even most raw materials wey them dey use make process food we get am , how come everything cost like this . Watin we go say be the cause of this one now . E Don vex me all person money now dey go for food . Abeg make una contribute for this matter I know say e dey vex all of us I am actually wondering what kind of breakfast some one would be eating for such a small amount of money, except you were only talking about bachelors and spinsters and forgot that there are also many of us that are married and have children to feed as well ...I know for a fact that anytime me and my family wants to take tea and bread for breakfast, I spend nothing less than #2,500 on just bread and tea alone, before I begin to consider eggs and spices and any other stuffs we might need to make the meal sumbcoius.Anyways, the current situation in Nigeria demand that we not just work hard, but pray hard too, because in as much as we really need to earn more so as to be able to keep up with all the expenses and the loss of the purchasing power of the naira, we also need to pray hard to God to make the means of earning more money available to us, because I personally believe that it's only by the help of God can we prevail in the current situation of the country.

comments.author: Antotena
comments.body: Quote from: Macoach on September 17, 2023, 05:52:52 AMOmo my fellow Niger men and women how una dey see this thing wey dey happen for our country cost of food dey increase on a monthly basis to chop common breakfast fit cost you like 700 - 1000 for management oh. And we dey farm dey produce rice and garri, even most raw materials wey them dey use make process food we get am , how come everything cost like this . Watin we go say be the cause of this one now . E Don vex me all person money now dey go for food . Abeg make una contribute for this matter I know say e dey vex all of us You are speaking about yourself of the whole nigeria? I'm asking because I'm not sure if 1k is enough to feed me because baba, me I dy chop well in the morning and I make sure everything set. Let's look at it this way bro.A loaf of bread soft one fit cost you ₦800, milk tin now na ₦500, you buy milo or any other beverage to add as ₦200, that's like ₦1500. If you come say you wan fry egg join, na more than ₦2,000 you dy spend be that. Na average wetin you fit chop as naija be this because I know no wetin you wan do with ₦1,000, e no go do except you wan dy drink akamu in the morning.  Now back to the matter, brother man, the truth or this matter na fuel subsidy removal na why everything don cost like this. Any sales that involves transportation has increase the price of their products and it's a normal thing in economy that when basic price of things are increase without alternative, other price of goods and services will also increases because they need to adjust their financial support to meet the current state of the economy. If price of rice was ₦1,000 and then the price jumped to ₦3,000, expect every other price of things to increased because the sellers need rice, they will also adjust their price so they can e able to buy and eat too while maintaining their business.There is nothing in this country that does not need transportation and as long say the price of fuel they up, we go dy buy things high but if they are able to stablise the USD at the current price that it's been sold, things will be stabilized for a while because we depends on refined fuel from outside the country and if dollar price continues to go up, then every price of goods will increaeas well.

comments.author: Macoach
comments.body: Quote from: Promocodeudo on September 17, 2023, 08:06:15 AMNigeria has gone from worst to too bad, sometimes I see a good reason to say that our leaders has no conscience, how will you allow the people that you are leading to die in hunger, our leader doesn't like the idea of licensing more production companies or better still encouraging small firms that are into production, because most of them have share or quota in a particular man business that have decided to keep his people in the dark by inflating the price of everything through the help of the government, Nigeria has everything within her reach not to allow it's citizen suffer, removal of subsidy has been the major cause for the suffering of Nigerians, a government that wake up and announce the removal of the only thing the citizens benefit from, without putting things in place to caution the effects that may arise as a result of this, I think its time for the right thing to be done, because the current hunger in the land is so unbearable that, it takes God to control people not to do otherwise, Nigeria needs urgent revitalization, and that's the way we should go.Brother I dey with you on this one , our leaders are seriously forcing every body to madness see the way the country is going confusion every where , our own president his certificate is not proven, them just calm down sell us finish . Then them come band the only thing I dey use chop Bitcoin make them come stop me nah

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Quote from: Macoach on September 17, 2023, 05:52:52 AME Don vex me all person money now dey go for food . My brother no be only food wey the thing affect. The falling standard of living affect every aspect of the economy, e just be say na food we dey deal with every moment. Okay see, people wey dey sell food put money for am or reduce hand for the quantity and quality wey dem dey sell because say other things too wey follow for wetin go make food cost, transport to go buy the incredient, kerosene abi na gas. Abi house rent never dey increase for your area? Oya wait make you finish the rent wey you pay for and to renew am you go sabi say rent too don increase because landlord or landlady too dey buy things costly and dem too go increase the rent wey dem dey from feed. My brother the thing na circle, no be only feeding e affect.

comments.author: iBaba
comments.body: Quote from: Macoach on September 17, 2023, 05:52:52 AMOmo my fellow Niger men and women how una dey see this thing wey dey happen for our country cost of food dey increase on a monthly basis to chop common breakfast fit cost you like 700 - 1000 for management oh. And we dey farm dey produce rice and garri, even most raw materials wey them dey use make process food we get am , how come everything cost like this . Watin we go say be the cause of this one now . E Don vex me all person money now dey go for food . Abeg make una contribute for this matter I know say e dey vex all of us This matter carry plenty kassala for head. I dey always dey scared to even discuss this kind of matter because I no fit even imagine how I dey take cope on top this economy again. Na why person suppose dey thank God fof the level wey we don reach so far. For basically being alive.The way e difficult to get money now for the country, e be like person wey wan climb mountain everest with him bare hands and feet. On top of this money and job unemployment, things con dey skyrocket and none wan come down. Even dollar and fuel just dey rise they go at their peaks.The question be say, how poor man wan take survive like this, when to eat better food on an average now reach ₦1,000 naira per meal. And an equivalent of ₦3,000 per 3 square meal.With the figures wey dey above, make we take laborer wey dey do strong work for instance. As a laborer you need eat food make u get energy do work. How much be your payment for 1 day wey you work? For this side of the country e no pass ₦2,500 per day. Now make we say, the laborer wan drink tea and bread for breakfast which takes like ₦500. Small lunch come be like ₦800 and dinner like ₦800 too. That na total of ₦2,100 out of the ₦2,500 wey him collect with ₦400 as the change wey remain.Abeg, when this person wan buy clothes to wear, buy other person needs, pay house rent con even send small back home?You see, this and more na the reason why people dey sleep under bridge and na why many people dey hostile to each other.

comments.author: rachael9385
comments.body: If to say na only food nai the economy affect e for they some how easy for those set of people way base for their villages because them for they do farm works take they feed them selfs and their families but since e be say nah everything nai they affected even the people way live for Town, city and villages they suffer, whether you get money or not e go affect you as long as say you they this country.One thing be say as Nigeria they so, nah very big country with over 223,804,632 people both the citizen and non citizen they inside even good and bad self they, but the bad plenty pass the good nai make we they suffer.Nigeria is @62 years so far and I don't know why the country economy is so bad to this extent that even the rich is complaining, now image the rich people complaining, so if the rich is complaining that means the poor will cry for hunger.

comments.author: AYOBA
comments.body: The problem of this our country now don get worst seriously no be waiting we sleep with we go wake with how we poor go take survive wey everything just dey high every forking dey, I can blame the farmers because even they're working materials don cost no be wetin de bort it last season dey sell am this season. Especially fertilizer wey before 1bag no pass 15k to 20k and now it's almost 50 to 60k, all the course of the does problem is do to bad government that we have, my brother is only God that can Stand for us if not the course of living wan killed the living.

comments.author: RockBell
comments.body: Quote from: Odohu on September 17, 2023, 08:42:21 AMThe salary of an average Nigerian worker is about N150,000( $160) per month and this is for graduates that have put in some years of service. Unfortunately, base on the currenct economic realities of our country, 50% of this fund is spent on feeding. This is to say that many people are leaving from hand to mouth because the remaining 50% is not enough to cover to shelter, health, clothing, utilities and other basic amenities. If urgent steps are not taken, people will drift towards depression and that is not good for a country with population of 200 million people.   Even earning 150k monthly relies on the industry you work in, and even gaining the money isn't helping much; the money can't even keep up with the bills because the person generating the money is still battling to stay up with the whole scenario.  And the government has refused to revise the minimum wage, at least because the price of things is not friendly to people at all, from the price of fuel to the price of food. Everyone is just trying to survive it is no longer about how well you are doing. because even housing is becoming ridiculously costly, because despair is terrible and leads to a slew of unpleasant outcomes, both mentally and physically.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Macoach on September 17, 2023, 05:52:52 AMOmo my fellow Niger men and women how una dey see this thing wey dey happen for our country cost of food dey increase on a monthly basis to chop common breakfast fit cost you like 700 - 1000 for management oh. And we dey farm dey produce rice and garri, even most raw materials wey them dey use make process food we get am , how come everything cost like this . Watin we go say be the cause of this one now . E Don vex me all person money now dey go for food . Abeg make una contribute for this matter I know say e dey vex all of us Na inflation cause everything,  because most time what Nigeria produce is raw materials and not finished goods because in most cases,  we still import almost all our basic necessities a d this have left us at the mercy of foreign exchange rate,  which now determine the price of basic goods in the market,  and that is the cause of the current economic downturn that we are witnessing today in the society. Basic needs have become out of reach for the ordinary citizens and also the cost of living in general talking about housing and the rest of what have you have all gone so high that survival now is just by the grace and high calculations.

comments.author: Ruttoshi
comments.body: Quote from: Macoach on September 17, 2023, 05:52:52 AMOmo my fellow Niger men and women how una dey see this thing wey dey happen for our country cost of food dey increase on a monthly basis to chop common breakfast fit cost you like 700 - 1000 for management oh. And we dey farm dey produce rice and garri, even most raw materials wey them dey use make process food we get am , how come everything cost like this . Watin we go say be the cause of this one now . E Don vex me all person money now dey go for food . Abeg make una contribute for this matter I know say e dey vex all of us All these high price of everything for Nigeria na because of fuel subsidy wey Tinubu remove. Ever since Tinubu took over power the rate of hardship is increasing day by day to the extend that a poor man might finf it difficult to feed. I notice that the price you buy something today will increase the next week when you want to buy that same stuff.Feeding is a basic need but the government don't understand this and they want the masses to die in hunger strive. No be small money I dey use feed myself alone for this place wey I dey. If I want to cook I will spend up to 3k but when I visit mama put, 1K no dy reach me chop because the food go small and some places only meat or fish will consune upto 500 naira talk more of the food itself. Poverty is really a major challenge in this country because the government have chosen to kill the poor people with harsh economy. All our gals are now on the street because of what they want to eat and some have been killed by ritualist, only God knows when Nigeria will become a better place for people to live happily due to good economy.

comments.author: Macoach
comments.created_time: September 18, 2023, 09:19:36 PMLast edit: September 19, 2023, 10:40:01 AM by hilariousandco
comments.body: Quote from: Promocodeudo on September 17, 2023, 08:06:15 AMNigeria has gone from worst to too bad, sometimes I see a good reason to say that our leaders has no conscience, how will you allow the people that you are leading to die in hunger, our leader doesn't like the idea of licensing more production companies or better still encouraging small firms that are into production, because most of them have share or quota in a particular man business that have decided to keep his people in the dark by inflating the price of everything through the help of the government, Nigeria has everything within her reach not to allow it's citizen suffer, removal of subsidy has been the major cause for the suffering of Nigerians, a government that wake up and announce the removal of the only thing the citizens benefit from, without putting things in place to caution the effects that may arise as a result of this, I think its time for the right thing to be done, because the current hunger in the land is so unbearable that, it takes God to control people not to do otherwise, Nigeria needs urgent revitalization, and that's the way we should go.Yes this is true the major problem here is bad and over corrupt leaders. Imagine tinibu saying its his turn ,meaning say them wan dey suffer the citizens turn by turn as we dey elect new presidents suffer dey increase even comon water pure water the most common of them all Don cost now u no fit buy water for you and your friends without thinking the thing. Now fuel wey the crude just dey under our land here don dey so expensive.  Tinibu just come comot subsidy wey we dey benefit from . This country na wa oh Quote from: Ruttoshi on September 18, 2023, 03:40:33 PMQuote from: Macoach on September 17, 2023, 05:52:52 AMOmo my fellow Niger men and women how una dey see this thing wey dey happen for our country cost of food dey increase on a monthly basis to chop common breakfast fit cost you like 700 - 1000 for management oh. And we dey farm dey produce rice and garri, even most raw materials wey them dey use make process food we get am , how come everything cost like this . Watin we go say be the cause of this one now . E Don vex me all person money now dey go for food . Abeg make una contribute for this matter I know say e dey vex all of us All these high price of everything for Nigeria na because of fuel subsidy wey Tinubu remove. Ever since Tinubu took over power the rate of hardship is increasing day by day to the extend that a poor man might finf it difficult to feed. I notice that the price you buy something today will increase the next week when you want to buy that same stuff.Feeding is a basic need but the government don't understand this and they want the masses to die in hunger strive. No be small money I dey use feed myself alone for this place wey I dey. If I want to cook I will spend up to 3k but when I visit mama put, 1K no dy reach me chop because the food go small and some places only meat or fish will consune upto 500 naira talk more of the food itself. Poverty is really a major challenge in this country because the government have chosen to kill the poor people with harsh economy. All our gals are now on the street because of what they want to eat and some have been killed by ritualist, only God knows when Nigeria will become a better place for people to live happily due to good economy.The most painful part of it is that the unemployment rate is also high . To see work do so u fit buy that expensive food no easy ,as I dey you like this my guy wey finish school still dey streat na now en wan learn affiliate marketing from me. My advice to every Nigerian is to start earning in dollars if not this hardship go finish you

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Op abeg, try relax a bit, making more than one comment in a roll is considered spamming on this forum, and it could lead to ban, try go through the forum rules to get a better understanding of this ..When you have more than one comment you want to reply to, what you need do is use the "insect quote" function, you can find this function on the top right corner of every comment posted on the thread when you are on the reply page..See the screenshot below to better understand what I mean..With the insect quote function, you can reply to as many posts/comments as possible in one comment, instead of having to reply one after the other in a roll; which is I forbidden.

comments.author: Franctoshi
comments.body: Quote from: Macoach on September 17, 2023, 05:52:52 AMOmo my fellow Niger men and women how una dey see this thing wey dey happen for our country cost of food dey increase every month to chop common breakfast fit cost you like 700 - 1000 for management oh. And we dey farm dey produce rice and garri, even most raw materials wey they dey use to make process food we get am, how come everything cost like this. Watin we go say be the cause of this one now. E Don vex me all person money now dey go for food. Abeg make una contribute for this matter I know say e dey vex all of us Concerning the current situation of things in Nigeria, E dey clear say the problem we get for we country na money inflation and price inflation join body,  as the dollar dey go up steady against the Naira ($1/960 current rate), Na so the cost of importation of goods and services, plus food prices will as well dey go up because Nigeria relies mostly on the important of goods to survive, hence making the country a consumer as supposed producer. It is really annoying to witness the current skyrocketing and instability in the price of things in Nigeria, when you go to the market today to buy something, if you go the next day you find out that the price has dramatically increased, that's insane.Our bad politicians contributed to this harsh situation in the country due to their selfishness and is affecting everyone, forgetting that both the poor, middle class, and rich go to the same market.

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Quote from: Macoach on September 17, 2023, 05:52:52 AMOmo my fellow Niger men and women how una dey see this thing wey dey happen for our country cost of food dey increase on a monthly basis to chop common breakfast fit cost you like 700 - 1000 for management oh. And we dey farm dey produce rice and garri, even most raw materials wey them dey use make process food we get am , how come everything cost like this . Watin we go say be the cause of this one now . E Don vex me all person money now dey go for food . Abeg make una contribute for this matter I know say e dey vex all of us Who tell you say we dey produce most raw materials wey we need to use arrange food, why the cost of foodstuffs dey high na our bad government. The bad government come dey affect the economy and when market woman dem go market things dun cost for that side because of importations and after them buy dem go need sell am costly too so dem fit make back their capitals and gains. No forget say dem no wake go buy this things, dey enter transport and due to the increase in fuel prices in the country, transportation dun add e own and when dey add all their expenses, to make small gain self dem need double the price of the goods wey dem dun buy or increase more than double just to get better gain. We also get some wey dey over greedy and dem dey add price without conscience. Quote from: Odohu on September 17, 2023, 08:42:21 AMThe salary of an average Nigerian worker is about N150,000( $160) per month and this is for graduates that have put in some years of service. Unfortunately, base on the currenct economic realities of our country, 50% of this fund is spent on feeding. This is to say that many people are leaving from hand to mouth because the remaining 50% is not enough to cover to shelter, health, clothing, utilities and other basic amenities. Where you dey get dat statistics from say dem dey pay average Nigeria #150k abi u dun forget say our minimum wage na #30k and no need to dey convert am to dollars, na we we dey hear so we understand ourselves. Na local board be dis and everything need dey local. Wetin me I know na say the average Nigeria salary na #50 +/- and I dey putt together all the official and jobs wey dem dey pay #70k, #80k, #90k etc and unofficial jobs wey dem dey pay less. The big jobs self go hard before dem pay you reach $100k and dat's if you see the job oh because wetin I know na say job no dey the country and now all this filling station attendant, super market attendant and other small small private companies jobs na him dey and those people dem no dey pay dem pass #60k.

comments.author: Mayor of ogba
comments.body: Quote from: Macoach on September 17, 2023, 05:52:52 AMOmo my fellow Niger men and women how una dey see this thing wey dey happen for our country cost of food dey increase every month to chop common breakfast fit cost you like 700 - 1000 for management oh. And we dey farm dey produce rice and garri, even most raw materials wey them dey use to make process food we get am, how come everything cost like this. Watin we go say be the cause of this one now. E Don vex me all person money now dey go for food. Abeg make una contribute for this matter I know say e dey vex all of us This 700 - 1000 naira to use chop breakfast na only if now one person wants to take the breakfast, and you no go chop belle full so that the 700 or 1000 naira go do you for the breakfast.In my view, flooding and the high cost of fuel are the costs while some things do cost for this country. For instance, if flood happens as e happened last year, e go make people way get farms in those areas where flood enters to harvest their produce when e never matured and sell it at a low price, when those people way flood no effect go harvest their farm produce to sell for market, them go sell their farm produce at a very high price because say e dy limited for that periodThe high cost of fuel follow keeps our country like this, we know say anywhere way transportation cost standard of living goes dy high too. Even to visit  person from this country na war if you reason money way you go spend for transportation you go just say make you relax o. Before to go buy garri from village come city to sell go cost you small money for transportation but now to buy garri from village come city na war because only the money way drivers go take from the garri way you carry go almost come out the money way you used to buy the garri half. Na this thing cost if them done dy successfully bring garri  come city them go sell one custard 1700 naira to get gain for their business. Na all these tins I talk above na in me see dy cost why food items dy cost for this country so.
